addimgtag-desc: Adds <img> tag support for MediaWiki 1.43 and later
addimgtag-whitelist-notice: Domain $1 is not in the whitelist.
addimgtag-empty-src: The src attribute is not set.
addimgtag-not-whitelisted-src: The src attribute is not whitelisted.
config-desc-addimgtagwhitelist: Whether or not to enable whitelisting
config-desc-addimgtagblacklist: Whether or not to enable blacklisting
config-desc-addimgtagfixselfclosing: Whether to try to auto close tags missing '/>' before parsing (experimental)
config-desc-addimgtagallowedschemes: Allowed URL schemes for images (evaluated before blocked list)
config-desc-addimgtagblockedschemes: Blocked URL schemes (takes precedence if matched)
config-desc-addimgtagenhancedvalidation: Enable enhanced validation (scheme filtering, attribute sanitization, whitelist/blacklist pattern support)
